headline.seo: Obesity Drug by Arena Has an Effect, but a Limited One
headline.print_headline: Drug Shows An Effect On Obesity, But Limited
headline.main: Obesity Drug Clears Trial, Arena Says

docs.lead_paragraph: Producing results it said would be good enough for regulatory approval, Arena Pharmaceuticals said its experimental obesity drug had succeeded in its first late-stage clinical trial.
docs.snippet: Producing results it said would be good enough for regulatory approval, Arena Pharmaceuticals said its experimental obesity drug had succeeded in its first late-stage clinical trial.

headline.print_headline: Prevention: One Drink a Day Tied to Lower Death Risk
headline.main: Prevention: One Drink a Day Tied to Lower Death Risk

docs.lead_paragraph: For people over 55, there may be benefits in a daily cocktail.
docs.snippet: For people over 55, there may be benefits in a daily cocktail.

headline.main: School Water Fountains to Prevent Obesity

docs.abstract: Encouraging kids to drink more water at school appears to lower a child’s risk for becoming overweight.
docs.lead_paragraph: Adding school water fountains, distributing water bottles in classrooms and teaching kids about the health benefits of water can lower a child’s risk for becoming overweight, a new study shows.
docs.snippet: Encouraging kids to drink more water at school appears to lower a child’s risk for becoming overweight.

headline.print_headline: Foreign Ways and War Scars Test Hospital
headline.main: Foreign Ways and War Scars Test Hospital

docs.lead_paragraph: Hennepin County Medical Center in Minneapolis offers an extraordinary vantage point on the ways immigrants are testing the medical establishment.
docs.snippet: Hennepin County Medical Center in Minneapolis offers an extraordinary vantage point on the ways immigrants are testing the medical establishment.
